scripts.validate-env: node -e "console.log('Validating server environment...'); const requiredVars = ['CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY', 'CLERK_SECRET_KEY', 'DBURI']; const missing = requiredVars.filter(v => !process.env[v]); if (missing.length) { console.error('❌ Missing environment variables:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } const key = process.env.CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY; const isProduction = key.startsWith('pk_live_'); console.log('✅ Environment:', isProduction ? 'Production' : 'Development'); console.log('✅ Database configured'); console.log('✅ Clerk configured'); console.log('Server environment validation complete!');"
